column1: Table 210-06103 : Unemployment rate and underemployment rate by age and sex

Starting from 2001, annual figures are compiled based on the survey results of the General Household Survey from January to December of the year concerned as well as the mid-year population estimates.
1 Unemployment rate refers to the proportion of unemployed persons in the labour force.
2 Underemployment rate refers to the proportion of underemployed persons in the labour force.
[*7] Figure is not released due to relatively large sampling error.
General Household Survey Section (3),Census and Statistics Department(Enquiry telephone no. : 2887 5508 Enquiry e-mail : ghs@censtatd.gov.hk)
